verses.verse: Oh sing <S%H7891><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> song <S%H7892><s%>: Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, all the earth <S%H776><s%>.
Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, bless <S%H1288><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%>; Show forth <S%H1319><s%> his salvation <S%H3444><s%> from day <S%H3117><s%> to day <S%H3117><s%>.
Declare <S%H5608><s%> his glory <S%H3519><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, His marvellous <S%H6381><s%> works among all the peoples <S%H5971><s%>.
For great <S%H1419><s%> is Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and greatly <S%H3966><s%> to be praised <S%H1984><s%>: He is to be feared <S%H3372><s%> above all gods <S%H430><s%>.
For all the gods <S%H430><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> are idols <S%H457><s%>; But Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%>.
Honor <S%H1935><s%> and majesty <S%H1926><s%> are before <S%H6440><s%> him <S%H5797><s%>: Strength and beauty <S%H8597><s%> are in his sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>.

Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, ye kindreds <S%H4940><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%>, Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> glory <S%H3519><s%> and strength <S%H5797><s%>.

Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> due unto his name <S%H8034><s%>: Bring <S%H5375><s%> an offering <S%H4503><s%>, and come <S%H935><s%> into his courts <S%H2691><s%>.
Oh worship <S%H7812><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in holy <S%H6944><s%> array <S%H1927><s%>: Tremble <S%H2342><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him <S%H776><s%>, all the earth.

Say <S%H559><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> reigneth <S%H4427><s%>: The world <S%H8398><s%> also is established <S%H3559><s%> that it cannot be moved <S%H4131><s%>: He will judge <S%H1777><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> with equity <S%H4339><s%>.
Let the heavens <S%H8064><s%> be glad <S%H1523><s%>, and let the earth <S%H776><s%> rejoice <S%H8055><s%>; Let the sea <S%H3220><s%> roar <S%H7481><s%>, and the fulness thereof <S%H4393><s%>;
Let the field <S%H7704><s%> exult <S%H5937><s%>, and all that is therein <S%H6086><s%>; Then shall all the trees of the wood <S%H3293><s%> sing for joy <S%H7442><s%>

Before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; For he cometh <S%H935><s%>, For he cometh <S%H935><s%> to judge <S%H8199><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>: He will judge <S%H8199><s%> the world <S%H8398><s%> with righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, And the peoples <S%H5971><s%> with his truth <S%H530><s%>.
